    • Method Detail

      • getTypesThatCanHaveOverrides

        java.util.List<BillingInstruction> getTypesThatCanHaveOverrides()
        Returns:
        the types of billing instructions for which the payment plan allows charge slicing overrides

      • getOverridesFor

        @Nullable
ChargeSlicingOverrides getOverridesFor(BillingInstruction billingInstructionType)
        Returns the charge slicing overrides, if any, that override the settings of this payment plan for the given billing instruction type. If there are no overrides for the given type, returns null.
        Parameters:
        billingInstructionType - the billing instruction type
        Returns:
        the charge slicing overrides, if any

      • setOverridesFor

        void setOverridesFor(BillingInstruction billingInstructionType,
                   ChargeSlicingOverrides overrides)
        Overrides the charge slicing settings for the given billingInstructionType
        Parameters:
        billingInstructionType - the billinginstructiontype
        overrides - the overrides to set

      • removeOverridesFor

        void removeOverridesFor(BillingInstruction billingInstructionType)
        Removes the charge slicing overrides for the given billingInstructionType
        Parameters:
        billingInstructionType - the billinginstructiontype

        void applyOverrides(ChargeSlicingOverrides chargeSlicingOverrides)
        Overrides the charge slicing settings with the overrides in chargeSlicingOverrides.
        Parameters:
        chargeSlicingOverrides - the overrides for charge slicing settings.
